items.title: Trump thanks officers and National Guard troops in D.C. stop
items.description: President Donald Trump visited law enforcement officers in D.C. as the administration continued its efforts to exert control over the city.

items.title: Newsom signs bills for redrawing voting maps as parties fight for control
items.description: California races toward redrawing congressional maps as Texas moves toward final approval of its plans.

items.title: Supreme Court clears way for nearly $800 million in cuts to NIH grants
items.description: The Trump administration said the research was unscientific and went against efforts to end initiatives related to diversity, equity and inclusion.
